about.title: About Me
about.paragraph:
Hello! My name is Josh and I'm a junior software engineer based in New Brunswick, Canada. I'm knowledgeable in full-stack development, specifically with React, Node and TypeScript.
 I have a passion for learning Japanese aswell with the ultimate goal of becoming a software engineer in Japan!
In my spare time you can usually find me at my computer studying Kanji decks or working on a new React project!

experience.title: Experience
experience.hennge:
My first time working and traveling to Japan was when I had the pleasure to be an intern at the software company HENNGE in 2025. I was chosen among with two other interns to be the first batch of front-end interns at HENNGE!

 I spent my time at HENNGE learning a variety of tools. Our Task was to build out a secure admin dashboard and display data from an API that was given to us.

 From this I was able to learn React Query, OAuth, GitHub Actions and a plethera of other technologies listed on the left hand side! 

 During my time at HENNGE I participated in daily standups with other software engineers and gained experience in communicating with other team members and resolving issues.

projects.title: Projects
projects.kana-typer-description:
Kana Typer is a web app that helps users learn the main two Japanese phonetic systems, Hiragana & Katakana.
 The user can select individual symbols, specific categories, or the entire system to study and review!
projects.coming-soon-description:
I'm working on a new project right now which isn't quite finished yet.
 Come back soon and it will be here :)
